dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: So, the dark warlock dares to challenge the light of Arkos the Radiant. What foolishness drives you, creature of shadows?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek power beyond the light. Arkos, your radiance blinds the true potential of this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Power beyond the light? A mere shadow creature like you dreams too grand. Prepare for the inevitable darkness that will consume you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The light blinds, but the shadows empower. Your radiance will falter in the depths of darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Empowerment through shadows? Your delusions will be your downfall. Embrace the darkness, for it shall be your eternal companion.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I stand unyielding in the depths of shadows, unfazed by your blinding light. Prepare for the eclipse that shall envelop the Darkened Veil.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Unyielding in shadows? Bold words from a creature of darkness. The eclipse you seek will be your undoing... Attack!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see now, your radiance is a facade, a weak mask against the true power of darkness. The shadow will reign supreme.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The power of darkness has clouded your judgment, dark warlock. Let the light of justice cleanse this realm... Attack!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your light is blinding, but the shadows hold secrets even you cannot comprehend. Prepare for the shadows to unravel your facade.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Secrets in shadows? Your insolence knows no bounds, dark warlock. Witness the true power of light as it obliterates your existence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The shadows whisper truths you dare not acknowledge, Arkos. Embrace the unknown before the dark engulfs you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Truths in shadows? Your arrogance is pitiful, dark warlock. The only truth you will face is your defeat... Attack!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your radiance fades in the veils of shadows, revealing the frailty of your purpose. The twilight awaits your inevitable decline.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Frailty in shadows? A pitiful attempt to challenge the light. Prepare for your end, creature of darkness... Attack!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The balance shifts, Arkos. Your light blinds the realm, but darkness will bring equilibrium. Prepare for the darkness to claim its rightful place.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Balance is fragile in the hands of darkness. You speak of equilibrium, yet chaos is all you will find in the end. Embrace your fate!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Equilibrium crumbles under the weight of your blinding light. Darkness shall be the ultimate victor, Arkos.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Victor of darkness? Your ignorance astounds me, dark warlock. Prepare to face the full fury of light... Attack!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The shadows creep upon your radiant facade, Arkos. Embrace the twilight that heralds your downfall.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Twilight heralds my downfall? Your words amuse me, dark warlock. It is time for your final lesson... Attack!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge your so-called righteousness, Arkos. Your light will flicker and fade in the face of true darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Righteousness challenged by a creature of darkness? Foolhardy words that shall pave the way to your demise.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your light blinds, but the shadows reveal the truth unseen. Embrace the darkness that unravels your facade, Arkos.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Truth unseen in shadows? Your misguided beliefs will be your downfall, dark warlock. Prepare for the ultimate annihilation.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The shadows conceal truths that your light cannot comprehend, Arkos. Prepare for the revelations that will forge the path to your destruction.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Concealed truths in shadows? Your arrogance will be your undoing, dark warlock. Prepare for your ultimate reckoning... Attack!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your radiance wanes in the presence of the shadows' embrace. The twilight heralds your end, Arkos.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The twilight heralds my end? Your boldness is matched only by your ignorance, dark warlock. Prepare for your final judgment... Attack!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The light of justice dims in the face of shadows that reveal your hypocrisy, Arkos. Prepare for the reckoning that awaits.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hypocrisy revealed? Your accusations hold no weight, dark warlock. Witness the true power of light as it banishes you from this realm.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The shadows expose your facade, Arkos. Embrace the darkness that engulfs your righteousness and seals your fate.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Facade exposed? Your insolence knows no bounds, dark warlock. Darkness shall be your only companion as I vanquish you... Attack!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your light blinds, but the shadows reveal the cracks in your armor, Arkos. Prepare for the darkness that will shatter your illusion.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Cracks in my armor? Your delusions amuse me, dark warlock. It is time for your eternal slumber... Attack!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The twilight awaits the end of your radiant charade, Arkos. Darkness will prevail, marking the beginning of your downfall.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The end of my charade? Your words hold no weight, dark warlock. Prepare to face your inevitable fate as the shadows consume you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The darkness uncovers the flaws beneath your light, Arkos. Embrace your descent into shadow before the twilight claims you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Descent into shadow? Your overconfidence will be your undoing, dark warlock. Prepare for the final showdown... Attack!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The veil of twilight shrouds your radiance, Arkos. Prepare for the darkness that will extinguish your false light.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: False light? Your arrogance knows no bounds, dark warlock. Let the light of justice purify this realm... Attack!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The shadows hunger for the light you so fervently wield, Arkos. Prepare for the eclipse that will mark the end of your luminous reign.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hunger for light taints your every word, dark warlock. The shadows you so boldly embrace will be your ultimate undoing.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The eclipse of shadows descends upon your radiant form, Arkos. Embrace the darkness that heralds your eternal night.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Eternal night in shadows? Your fantasies will be crushed by the power of light, dark warlock. Prepare for your final obliteration.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The shadows eclipse even your radiant glare, Arkos. Prepare for the twilight that heralds your descent into darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Descent into darkness heralded by twilight? Your demise is imminent, dark warlock. Witness the light's cleansing... Attack!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your light fades as the night of shadows engulfs your radiance, Arkos. Prepare for the darkness that will unravel your false purity.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Unravel my purity? Your audacity is unmatched, dark warlock. It is time for your eternal banishment... Attack!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The shadows' eclipse dims your glow, Arkos. Embrace the darkness that heralds the end of your false dawn.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: False dawn? Your words hold no sway over the light, dark warlock. Witness the power that will extinguish your very essence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The darkness encroaches upon your radiant form, Arkos. Embrace the twilight that will be your eternal shroud.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Eternal shroud in twilight? Your downfall is nigh, dark warlock. Prepare for the light's ultimate justice... Attack!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your radiance pales in the face of the shadows' eclipse, Arkos. Prepare for the darkness that will snuff out your false brilliance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: False brilliance extinguished by shadows? Your defiance will be your undoing, dark warlock. Let the light prevail... Attack!
